title: Makro Kalkylator
metaDescription: Gratis macro calculator - Beräkna your protein, carbohydrate, and fat distribution baserat på your goal. Get your personalized nutrition plan.

activityLevels.extraActive: Extra active (very intense daily träning or physical job)

info.title: Om Macronutrients
info.description: Macronutrients (protein, carbohydrates, and fats) are the nutrients that provide energy to your body. This calculator determines your total daily energy expenditure and distributes calories into macronutrients baserat på your goal and preferred diet type.
info.formula: Formel: BMR (Mifflin-St Jeor) × Aktivitet Multiplier ± Goal Adjustment
info.limitations: This calculator provides estimates baserat på standard formulas. Individual requirements may vary. Consult with a healthcare professional or nutritionist for a personalized plan.
